00024 VectorDisplay::Color::Color(uint32_t col)
00025 {
00026   r=float((col & 0xFF0000ull)>>16)/255.0;
00027   g=float((col & 0xFF00ull)>>8)/255.0;
00028   b=float(col & 0xFFull)/255.0;
00029 }
00030 
00031 VectorDisplay::Color::Color(float _r, float _g, float _b)
00032 {
00033   r=_r;
00034   g=_g;
00035   b=_b;
00036 }

00038 VectorDisplay::VectorDisplay(QWidget* parent) : QGLWidget(QGLFormat ( QGL::SampleBuffers ),parent)
00039 {
00040   lines.clear();
00041   points.clear();
00042   robotAngle = 0.0;
00043   robotLoc.set(0.0,0.0);
00044   displayWindow = 100.0;
00045   
00046   lineThickness = 2.0;
00047   pointsSize = 1.5;
00048   
00049   viewScale = 1.0;
00050   viewXOffset = viewYOffset = 0.0;
00051   
00052   ptrCallback = NULL;
00053   followRobot = false;
00054   showRobot = true;
00055   
00056   connect(this, SIGNAL(redraw()), this, SLOT(redrawHandler()));
00057   
00058 }
00059 
00060 void VectorDisplay::redrawHandler()
00061 {
00062   graphicsMutex.lock();
00063   this->update();
00064   graphicsMutex.unlock();
00065 }
00066 
00067 void VectorDisplay::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent* event)
00068 {
00069   leftButton = event->buttons().testFlag(Qt::LeftButton);
00070   midButton = event->buttons().testFlag(Qt::MidButton);
00071   rightButton = event->buttons().testFlag(Qt::RightButton);
00072   bool shiftKey = event->modifiers().testFlag(Qt::ShiftModifier);
00073   bool ctrlKey = event->modifiers().testFlag(Qt::ControlModifier);
00074   bool altKey = event->modifiers().testFlag(Qt::AltModifier);
00075   
00076   if(leftButton || midButton){
00077     // Start Pan
00078     mouseStartX = event->x();
00079     mouseStartY = event->y();
00080     redraw();
00081   }
00082   if( (ctrlKey || shiftKey || altKey) && leftButton ){
00083     double scale = 2.0*viewScale*min(width(),height())/displayWindow;
00084     double x = (double(event->x()) - 0.5*double(width()) - viewXOffset)/scale;
00085     double y = (0.5*double(height()) - double(event->y()) - viewYOffset)/scale;
00086     
00087     setLocation.set(x,y);
00088     mouseStartX = event->x();
00089     mouseStartY = event->y();
00090   }
00091   
00092 }
00093 
00094 void VectorDisplay::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent* event)
00095 {
00096   bool shiftKey = event->modifiers().testFlag(Qt::ShiftModifier);
00097   bool ctrlKey = event->modifiers().testFlag(Qt::ControlModifier);
00098   bool altKey = event->modifiers().testFlag(Qt::AltModifier);
00099   
00100   double scale = 2.0*viewScale*min(width(),height())/displayWindow;
00101   double x = (double(event->x()) - 0.5*double(width()) - viewXOffset)/scale;
00102   double y = (0.5*double(height()) - double(event->y()) - viewYOffset)/scale;
00103   vector2d setLocation2(x,y);
00104   
00105   if( shiftKey && leftButton ){
00106     double setOrientation = atan2(-(event->y()-mouseStartY),event->x()-mouseStartX);
00107     if(ptrCallback)
00108       ptrCallback(setLocation,setLocation2,setOrientation, 3);
00109   }else if( ctrlKey && leftButton ){
00110     double setOrientation = atan2(-(event->y()-mouseStartY),event->x()-mouseStartX);
00111     if(ptrCallback)
00112       ptrCallback(setLocation,setLocation2,setOrientation, 2);
00113   }else if( altKey && leftButton ){
00114     double setOrientation = atan2(-(event->y()-mouseStartY),event->x()-mouseStartX);
00115     if(ptrCallback)
00116       ptrCallback(setLocation,setLocation2,setOrientation, 1);
00117   }
00118 }
00119 
00120 void VectorDisplay::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent* event)
00121 {
00122   static const bool debug = false;
00123   bool leftButton = event->buttons().testFlag(Qt::LeftButton);
00124   bool midButton = event->buttons().testFlag(Qt::MidButton);
00125   bool rightButton = event->buttons().testFlag(Qt::RightButton);
00126   bool shiftKey = event->modifiers().testFlag(Qt::ShiftModifier);
00127   bool ctrlKey = event->modifiers().testFlag(Qt::ControlModifier);
00128   bool altKey = event->modifiers().testFlag(Qt::AltModifier);
00129   
00130   if(debug) printf("MouseMove Event, Left:%d Mid:%d Right:%d\n", leftButton?1:0, midButton?1:0, rightButton?1:0);
00131   if(shiftKey || ctrlKey || altKey){
00132     //No need to do anything - location or target will be set
00133     return;
00134   }
00135   if(leftButton){
00136     //Pan
00137     viewXOffset += double(event->x() - mouseStartX);
00138     viewYOffset -= double(event->y() - mouseStartY);
00139     mouseStartX = event->x();
00140     mouseStartY = event->y();
00141     redraw();
00142   }else if(midButton){
00143     //Zoom
00144     double zoomRatio = -double(event->y() - mouseStartY)/500.0;
00145     double oldScale = viewScale;
00146     viewScale = viewScale*(1.0+zoomRatio);
00147     viewXOffset *= viewScale/oldScale;
00148     viewYOffset *= viewScale/oldScale;
00149     mouseStartX = event->x();
00150     mouseStartY = event->y();
00151     redraw();
00152   }
00153 }
00154 
00155 void VectorDisplay::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent* event)
00156 {
00157   static const bool debug = false;
00158   double zoomRatio = double(event->delta())/1000.0;
00159   double oldScale = viewScale;
00160   viewScale = viewScale*(1.0+zoomRatio);
00161   viewXOffset *= viewScale/oldScale;
00162   viewYOffset *= viewScale/oldScale;
00163   if(debug) printf("Zoom: %5.3f\n",viewScale);
00164   redraw();
00165 }
00166 
00167 void VectorDisplay::keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent* event)
00168 {
00169   static const bool debug = false;
00170   bool shiftKey = event->modifiers().testFlag(Qt::ShiftModifier);
00171   bool ctrlKey = event->modifiers().testFlag(Qt::ControlModifier);
00172   if(debug) printf("KeyPress: 0x%08X\n",event->key());
00173   if(event->key() == Qt::Key_Space)
00174     resetView();
00175   if(event->key() == Qt::Key_Escape)
00176     close();
00177   if(event->key() == Qt::Key_F){
00178     followRobot = !followRobot;
00179     if(followRobot)
00180       viewXOffset = viewYOffset = 0.0;
00181     redraw();
00182   }
00183   if(event->key() == Qt::Key_R){
00184     showRobot = !showRobot;
00185     redraw();
00186   }
00187   if(event->key() == Qt::Key_BracketLeft){
00188     if(ctrlKey)
00189       pointsSize = max(0.1,pointsSize-0.1);
00190     else
00191       lineThickness = max(0.1,lineThickness-0.1);
00192     redraw();
00193   }
00194   if(event->key() == Qt::Key_BracketRight){
00195     if(ctrlKey)
00196       pointsSize += 0.1;
00197     else
00198       lineThickness += 0.1;
00199     redraw();
00200   }
00201 }
00202 
00203 void VectorDisplay::resetView()
00204 {
00205   viewScale = 1.0;
00206   viewXOffset = viewYOffset = 0.0;
00207   redraw();
00208 }

00210 void VectorDisplay::initializeGL()
00211 {
00212   glEnable(GL_MULTISAMPLE);
00213 }

00215 void VectorDisplay::setupViewport(int width, int height)
00216 {
00217   glViewport(0, 0, width, height);
00218   glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00219   glLoadIdentity();
00220   glOrtho(-0.5*viewScale*width+viewXOffset, 0.5*viewScale*width+viewXOffset, -0.5*viewScale*height+viewYOffset, 0.5*viewScale*height+viewYOffset, minZValue, maxZValue);
00221   glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00222 }
00223 
00224 void VectorDisplay::resizeGL(int width, int height)
00225 {
00226   setupViewport(width, height);
00227 }
00228 
00229 void VectorDisplay::drawCircles(float lineThickness)
00230 {
00231   static const float circleSize = 0.3;
00232   
00233   bool coloredCircles = (circleColors.size()==circles.size());
00234   if(coloredCircles){
00235     for(unsigned int i=0; i<circles.size(); i++){
00236       glColor4f(circleColors[i].red(), circleColors[i].green(), circleColors[i].blue(), 1.0);
00237       drawArc(circles[i].x, circles[i].y, circleSize,circleSize+lineThickness,0,M_2PI);
00238     }
00239   }else{
00240     glColor4f(0.35,0.35,0.35,1.0);
00241     for(unsigned int i=0; i<circles.size(); i++){
00242       drawArc(circles[i].x, circles[i].y, circleSize,circleSize+lineThickness,0,M_2PI);
00243     }
00244   }
00245 }

00247 template <class num> void VectorDisplay::drawLine(GVector::vector2d< num >& p0, GVector::vector2d< num >& p1, num lineWidth)
00248 {
00249   Line2d<num> l(p0,p1);
00250   drawLine<num>(l,lineWidth);
00251 }
00252 
00253 template <class num> void VectorDisplay::drawLine(Line2d< num >& line, num lineWidth)
00254 {
00255   GVector::vector2d<num> v0=line.P0(), v1=line.P1();
00256   GVector::vector2d<num> d = line.Dir();
00257   GVector::vector2d<num> n = line.Perp()*lineWidth;
00258   d *= lineWidth;
00259   v0 = v0-d;
00260   v1 = v1+d;
00261   GVector::vector2d<num> p0=v0-n, p1=v1-n, p2=v1+n, p3=v0+n;
00262   
00263   //glColor4f(0.35,0.35,0.35,1.0);
00264   glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00265   glVertex3f(V2COMP(p0),0.0);
00266   glVertex3f(V2COMP(p1),0.0);
00267   glVertex3f(V2COMP(p2),0.0);
00268   glVertex3f(V2COMP(p3),0.0);
00269   glEnd();
00270 }
00271 
00272 template <class num> void VectorDisplay::drawPoint(GVector::vector2d<num> loc, float pointSize)
00273 {
00274   drawQuad(loc.x-pointSize, loc.y-pointSize, loc.x+pointSize, loc.y+pointSize, 0.2);
00275 }

00278 void VectorDisplay::drawLines(float lineThickness)
00279 {
00280   bool coloredLines = (lineColors.size()==lines.size());
00281   if(coloredLines){
00282     for(unsigned int i=0; i<lines.size(); i++){
00283       glColor4f(lineColors[i].red(), lineColors[i].green(), lineColors[i].blue(), 1.0);
00284       drawLine(lines[i],lineThickness);
00285     }
00286   }else{
00287     glColor4f(0.35,0.35,0.35,1.0);
00288     for(unsigned int i=0; i<lines.size(); i++){
00289       drawLine(lines[i],lineThickness);
00290     }
00291   }
00292 }
00293 
00294 void VectorDisplay::drawPoints(float pointsSize)
00295 {
00296   bool coloredPoints = (pointColors.size()==points.size());
00297   if(coloredPoints){
00298     for(unsigned int i=0; i<points.size(); i++){
00299       glColor4f(pointColors[i].red(), pointColors[i].green(), pointColors[i].blue(), 1.0);
00300       drawPoint(points[i],pointsSize);
00301     }
00302   }else{
00303     glColor4f(0.94,0.46,0.12,1.0);
00304     
00305     for(unsigned int i=0; i<points.size(); i++){
00306       drawPoint(points[i],pointsSize);
00307     }
00308   }
00309 }
00310 
00311 void VectorDisplay::paintEvent(QPaintEvent* event)
00312 {  
00313   
00314   graphicsMutex.lock();
00315   makeCurrent();
00316   glClearColor(BACKGROUND_COLOR);
00317   glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
00318   glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00319   glDisable(GL_CULL_FACE);
00320   glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00321   glEnable(GL_MULTISAMPLE);
00322   
00323   glClear (GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00324   glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00325   glPushMatrix();
00326   glLoadIdentity();
00327   
00328   double scale = 2.0*viewScale*min(width(),height())/displayWindow;
00329   glTranslatef(viewXOffset, viewYOffset, 0.0);
00330   glScalef(scale,scale,scale);
00331   
00332   if(followRobot)
00333     glTranslatef(-(robotLoc.x),-(robotLoc.y),0.0);
00334   
00335   drawLines(lineThickness/scale);
00336   drawCircles(lineThickness/scale);
00337   drawPoints(pointsSize/scale);
00338   
00339   //drawArc(0,0,1.0, 1.5,0.0,M_2PI);
00340   if(showRobot){
00341     const double robotSize = 0.25;
00342     vector2d h;
00343     h.heading(robotAngle);
00344     vector2d p = robotLoc + 2.0*robotSize*h;
00345     glColor4f(1.0, 0.416, 0.0, 1.0);
00346     drawArc(robotLoc,robotSize, robotSize+1.5*lineThickness/scale,0.0,M_2PI,0.0,RAD(4.0));
00347     drawLine(robotLoc,p, 0.75*lineThickness/scale);
00348   }
00349   
00350   //vectorTextTest();
00351   glPopMatrix();
00352   swapBuffers();
00353   graphicsMutex.unlock();
00354 }
00355 
00356 void VectorDisplay::updateLines(vector<line2f> _lines, vector<Color> _lineColors)
00357 {
00358   graphicsMutex.lock();
00359   lines = _lines;
00360   if(lines.size()==_lineColors.size())
00361     lineColors = _lineColors;
00362   else
00363     lineColors.clear();
00364   graphicsMutex.unlock();
00365   redraw();
00366 }
00367 
00368 void VectorDisplay::updatePoints(vector< vector2f > _points, vector< Color > _pointColors)
00369 {
00370   graphicsMutex.lock();
00371   points = _points;
00372   if(points.size()==_pointColors.size())
00373     pointColors = _pointColors;
00374   else
00375     pointColors.clear();
00376   graphicsMutex.unlock();
00377   redraw();
00378 }
00379 
00380 void VectorDisplay::updateCircles(vector< vector2f > _circles, vector< Color > _circleColors)
00381 {
00382   graphicsMutex.lock();
00383   circles = _circles;
00384   if(circles.size()==_circleColors.size())
00385     circleColors = _circleColors;
00386   else
00387     circleColors.clear();
00388   graphicsMutex.unlock();
00389   redraw();
00390 }
00391 
00392 void VectorDisplay::updateDisplay(vector2d _robotLoc, double _robotAngle, double _displayWindow, 
00393                                   vector<line2f> _lines, vector<vector2f> _points, vector<vector2f> _circles, 
00394                                   vector<Color> _lineColors, vector<Color> _pointColors, vector<Color> _circleColors)
00395 {
00396   updateLines(_lines,_lineColors);
00397   updatePoints(_points,_pointColors);
00398   updateCircles(_circles,_circleColors);
00399   graphicsMutex.lock();
00400   robotAngle = _robotAngle;
00401   robotLoc = _robotLoc;
00402   displayWindow = _displayWindow;
00403   graphicsMutex.unlock();
00404   redraw();
00405 }

00407 void VectorDisplay::resizeEvent(QResizeEvent* event)
00408 {
00409   QGLWidget::resizeEvent(event);
00410   redraw();
00411 }

00413 template <class num> void VectorDisplay::drawQuad(GVector::vector2d< num > loc1, GVector::vector2d< num > loc2, num z)
00414 {
00415   glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00416   glVertex3d(loc1.x,loc1.y,z);
00417   glVertex3d(loc2.x,loc1.y,z);
00418   glVertex3d(loc2.x,loc2.y,z);
00419   glVertex3d(loc1.x,loc2.y,z);
00420   glEnd();
00421 }
00422 
00423 template <class num> void VectorDisplay::drawArc(GVector::vector2d< num > loc, num r1, num r2, num theta1, num theta2, num z, num dTheta)
00424 {
00425   static const double tesselation = 0.1;
00426   if(dTheta<0){
00427     dTheta = tesselation/r2;
00428   }
00429   glBegin(GL_QUAD_STRIP);
00430   for(double theta=theta1; theta<theta2; theta+=dTheta){
00431     double c1 = cos(theta), s1 = sin(theta);
00432     glVertex3d(r2*c1+loc.x,r2*s1+loc.y,z);
00433     glVertex3d(r1*c1+loc.x,r1*s1+loc.y,z);
00434   }
00435   double c1 = cos(theta2), s1 = sin(theta2);
00436   glVertex3d(r2*c1+loc.x,r2*s1+loc.y,z);
00437   glVertex3d(r1*c1+loc.x,r1*s1+loc.y,z);
00438   glEnd();
00439 }
